    • Constructor Detail

      • Accessory

        public Accessory()
        This is the default constructor of an Accessory. It is used to make an empty one.

      • Accessory

        public Accessory(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> data)
        This is the constructor of an Accessory.
        Parameters:
        data, - an HashMap It will create a new empty Accessory and it will use all the setter in the HashMap.
